NF.Q: Between which pairs of nodes in column Distribution Center and column Warehouse is the flow between 175 and 186? Please list the source node, target node, and the corresponding flow value.

NC.Q: Between the flows from node North Hub to node Bulk Storage and from node Regional Warehouse A to node Food Processing Plant, which path has a larger flow?

NC.Q: Among the flows from node Food Processing Plant to node Labeling, from node Electronics Plant to node Test Facility, and from node Bulk Storage to node Electronics Plant, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {Bulk Storage} to node {Electronics Plant} is the largest.

NC.Q: Among the flows from node South Hub to node Spare Parts Depot, from node Food Processing Plant to node Test Facility, and from node Electronics Plant to node Labeling, which path has the largest flow?
NC.A: The flow from node {South Hub} to node {Spare Parts Depot} is the largest.

MSR.Q: Which node in the column Factory of the sankey chart is the most critical?

MSR.Q: What is the path with the highest total flow from source node Express Sorting Center to target node Labeling? Please list all node labels along this path.
